cards.title: Orbit
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Distance and speed are set... Let's get things flying.

cards.title: Heavy Blockade
cards.powers: This card deals 1 target 3 melee damage.
body: When this card is destroyed, this card deals 1 target 2 melee damage.

cards.title: Fractured Backdrop
cards.powers: This card deals up to 4 targets 1 projectile damage each.
body: When this card is destroyed, this card deals each non-Hero target 1 melee damage and 1 projectile damage.

cards.title: Volatile Barricade
cards.powers: This card deals up to 2 targets 2 toxic damage each.
body: When this card is destroyed, you may destroy up to 2 ongoing or environment cards and this card deals up to 2 targets 2 toxic damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: These fights would have much less collateral damage if villains followed standard safety regulations.

cards.title: Collision Course
body: Play this card next to a target.
{Orbit} deals that target 2 melee damage now.
At the end of that target's turn, you may have that target deal 1 other target and themselves 2 melee damage. If you do, destroy this card.

cards.title: Guide the Blow
body: Play this card next to a target.
{Orbit} deals that target 2 melee damage now.
When that target deals damage, you may redirect that damage to another target. If you do, destroy this card.

cards.title: Corrective Motion
body: Play this card next to a target.
{Orbit} deals that target 2 melee damage now.
When that target would be dealt damage by a target other than Orbit, you may increase that damage by 2. If you do, destroy this card.

cards.title: Subtle Preparation
body: When this card enters play, you may draw 2 cards and play up to 2 cards.
{Orbit} cannot deal damage.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

cards.title: Control the Field
cards.powers: Search your deck for 2 cover cards and play them. Shuffle your deck. Destroy this card.
body: At the start of your turn, destroy 1 cover card.
Reduce damage deal to {Orbit} by 1 for each cover card in play.

cards.title: Objects in Motion
cards.powers: Any hero may use a power now.
body: During your turn, increase damage dealt by targets other than {Orbit} by 1.

cards.title: Landscape Awareness
body: You may use an additional power during your power phase.

cards.title: Redesignate
body: Put any number of Orbital cards in play back in your hand.
Draw 3 cards or play up to 3 Orbital cards.

cards.title: Rapid Fire
body: {Orbit} deals up to 3 targets 1 projectile damage.
{Orbit} deals up to 2 targets 2 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: A thrown stone can knock someone out. These move faster than I can throw them.

cards.title: Guide the Wreckage
body: {Orbit} deals 1 target 1 melee damage. Increase this damage by 1 for each Cover card in your trash.
Play 1 Cover card from your trash.

flavorQuotes.text: It's one of those quirks of powers. I can only manipulate so many things at once. But if something I'm manipulating is shattered, it's still one thing.

cards.title: Orbital Slingshot
body: {Orbit} deals 1 target 3 sonic damage. Increase this damage by 2 for each of your Orbital or Cover cards in play.
Orbit deals themselves 2 sonic damage.

promoCards.title: Orbit - Artificial Satellite
powers: Draw 1 Card. Reduce damage dealt to {Orbit} by 1 until the start of your next turn.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: I'm already here. Let's get started.
